property.name: navigationMenuDevName
property.label: Navigation Menu Name
property.description: Developer Name of Site Navigation Menu to use (menus are defined in Settings>Navigation).

property.name: serviceName
property.label: Service Name
property.description: The Service Name to display in the header

property.name: serviceURL
property.label: Service Name Link URL
property.description: URL of navigation link associated with Service Name. Use full https:// format.
